trans-unit.source: Describes the placement of where a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control appears on the screen.
trans-unit.target: Descrive la posizione in cui un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref> controllo viene visualizzato sullo schermo.

trans-unit.source: Use the members of this enumeration class to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare i membri di questa classe di enumerazione per impostare il valore della <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A>proprietà di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A> property value, together with the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset%2A>properties, determines where and how a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> appears on the screen.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A>insieme ai valori del valore della proprietà di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset%2A>proprietà, determina dove e come un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>visualizzata sullo schermo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [Popup Placement Behavior](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control relative to the upper-left corner of the screen and at an offset that is defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset*> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset*> property values.
trans-unit.target: Una posizione il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref> controllo rispetto all'angolo superiore sinistro della schermata e un offset definito dal <> </> *> e <> </> *> i valori delle proprietà.

trans-unit.source: If the screen edge obscures the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>, the control then repositions itself to align with the edge.
trans-unit.target: Se il bordo dello schermo nasconde il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref>, il controllo viene riposizionato per allinearlo al bordo.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: A position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control relative to the upper-left corner of the screen and at an offset that is defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset*> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset*> property values.
trans-unit.target: Una posizione il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref> controllo rispetto all'angolo superiore sinistro della schermata e un offset definito dal <> </> *> e <> </> *> i valori delle proprietà.

trans-unit.source: If the screen edge obscures the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>, the control extends in the opposite direction from the axis defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset*> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset*>=.
trans-unit.target: Se il bordo dello schermo nasconde il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref>, il controllo si estende nella direzione opposta rispetto all'asse definito dal <> </> *> o <> </> *> =.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: A position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control where the control aligns its upper edge with the lower edge of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget*> and aligns its left edge with the left edge of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget*>.
trans-unit.target: Posizione del <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref> controllo in cui il controllo Allinea il bordo superiore al bordo inferiore del <> </> *> e il bordo sinistro al bordo sinistro del <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: If the lower screen-edge obscures the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>, the control repositions itself so that its lower edge aligns with the upper edge of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget*>.
trans-unit.target: Se il bordo inferiore dello schermo nasconde il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref>, il controllo viene riposizionato in modo che il bordo inferiore viene allineato al bordo superiore di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget*>

trans-unit.source: If the upper screen-edge obscures the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>, the control then repositions itself so that its upper edge aligns with the upper screen-edge.
trans-unit.target: Se il bordo superiore dello schermo nasconde il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref>, il controllo viene riposizionato in modo che il bordo superiore è allineato al bordo dello schermo superiore.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: A position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control where it is centered over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget*>.
trans-unit.target: Una posizione di <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref> controllo in cui viene centrato su <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget*>

trans-unit.source: If a screen edge obscures the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>, the control repositions itself to align with the screen edge.
trans-unit.target: Se un bordo dello schermo nasconde il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref>, il controllo viene riposizionato per allinearlo al bordo dello schermo.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: A position and repositioning behavior for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control that is defined by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacementCallback"></xref> delegate specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.CustomPopupPlacementCallback%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Un comportamento di posizione e il riposizionamento per il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref> controllo definito dal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacementCallback"> </xref> delegato specificato per il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.CustomPopupPlacementCallback%2A?displayProperty=fullName> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control that aligns its right edge with the left edge of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget*> and aligns its upper edge with the upper edge of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget*>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref> viene allineato al bordo sinistro del controllo di <> </> *> e il bordo superiore al bordo superiore del <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: If the left screen-edge obscures the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>, the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> repositions itself so that its left edge aligns with the right edge of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget*>.
trans-unit.target: Se il bordo sinistro dello schermo nasconde il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref> riposizionato in modo da allineare il bordo destro di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget*>

trans-unit.source: If the right screen-edge obscures the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>, the right edge of the control aligns with the right screen-edge.
trans-unit.target: Se il bordo destro dello schermo nasconde il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref>, il bordo destro del controllo viene allineato al bordo destro dello schermo.

trans-unit.source: If the upper or lower screen-edge obscures the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>, the control repositions itself to align with the obscuring screen edge.
trans-unit.target: Se il bordo superiore o inferiore dello schermo nasconde il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref>, il controllo viene riposizionato in modo con tale bordo dello schermo.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: A postion of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control that aligns its upper edge with the lower edge of the bounding box of the mouse and aligns its left edge with the left edge of the bounding box of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Posizione del rispettivamente il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref> controllo che consente di allineare il bordo superiore al bordo inferiore del rettangolo di selezione del mouse e il bordo sinistro al bordo sinistro del rettangolo di selezione del mouse.

trans-unit.source: If the lower screen-edge obscures the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>, it repositions itself to align with the upper edge of the bounding box of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Se il bordo inferiore dello schermo nasconde il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref>, il controllo viene riposizionato per allinearlo al bordo superiore del rettangolo di selezione del mouse.

trans-unit.source: If the upper screen-edge obscures the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>, the control repositions itself to align with the upper screen-edge.
trans-unit.target: Se il bordo superiore dello schermo nasconde il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref>, il controllo viene riposizionato per allineare il bordo superiore dello schermo.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: A position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control relative to the tip of the mouse cursor and at an offset that is defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset*> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset*> property values.
trans-unit.target: Posizione del <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref> controllo in relazione punta del cursore del mouse e un offset definito dal <> </> *> e <> </> *> i valori delle proprietà.

trans-unit.source: If a horizontal or vertical screen edge obscures the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>, it opens in the opposite direction from the obscuring edge.
trans-unit.target: Se un bordo orizzontale o verticale dello schermo poco chiaro il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref>, aprirla nella direzione opposta tale bordo.

trans-unit.source: If the opposite screen edge also obscures the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>, it then aligns with the obscuring screen edge.
trans-unit.target: Se il bordo opposto dello schermo anche nasconde il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref>, quindi viene allineato al bordo dello schermo di controllo.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: A position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control relative to the upper-left corner of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget*> and at an offset that is defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset*> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset*> property values.
trans-unit.target: Posizione del <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref> controllo rispetto all'angolo superiore sinistro del <> </> *> e un offset definito dal <> </> *> e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset*>i valori delle proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset*>

trans-unit.source: If the screen edge obscures the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>, the control repositions itself to align with the screen edge.
trans-unit.target: Se il bordo dello schermo nasconde il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref>, il controllo viene riposizionato per allinearlo al bordo dello schermo.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: A position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control relative to the upper-left corner of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget*> and at an offset that is defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset*> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset*> property values. If a screen edge obscures the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>, the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> extends in the opposite direction from the direction from the axis defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset*> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset*>.
trans-unit.target: Posizione del <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref> controllo rispetto all'angolo superiore sinistro del <> </> *> e un offset definito dal <> </> *> e <> </> *> i valori delle proprietà. Se un bordo dello schermo nasconde il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref> si estende nella direzione opposta all'asse definito dal <> </> *> o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset*>

trans-unit.source: If the opposite screen edge also obscures the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>, the control then aligns with this screen edge.
trans-unit.target: Se il bordo opposto dello schermo anche nasconde il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref>, il controllo viene allineato con il bordo dello schermo.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: A position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control that aligns its left edge with the right edge of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget*> and aligns its upper edge with the upper edge of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget*>.
trans-unit.target: Posizione del <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref> controllo che consente di allineare il bordo sinistro al bordo destro del <> </> *> e il bordo superiore al bordo superiore del <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: If the right screen-edge obscures the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>, the control repositions itself so that its left edge aligns with the left edge of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget*>.
trans-unit.target: Se il bordo destro dello schermo nasconde il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref>, il controllo viene riposizionato in modo da allineare il bordo sinistro dell'elemento <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget*>

trans-unit.source: If the left screen-edge obscures the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>, the control repositions itself so that its left edge aligns with the left screen-edge.
trans-unit.target: Se il bordo sinistro dello schermo nasconde il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref>, il controllo viene riposizionato in modo da allineare il bordo sinistro dello schermo.

trans-unit.source: If the upper or lower screen-edge obscures the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>, the control then repositions itself to align with the obscuring screen edge.
trans-unit.target: Se il bordo superiore o inferiore dello schermo nasconde il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref>, il controllo viene riposizionato in modo da tale bordo dello schermo.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: A position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control that aligns its lower edge with the upper edge of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget*> and aligns its left edge with the left edge of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget*>.
trans-unit.target: Una posizione del <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref> controllo che consente di allineare il bordo inferiore al bordo superiore di <> </> *> e il bordo sinistro al bordo sinistro del <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: If the upper screen-edge obscures the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>, the control repositions itself so that its upper edge aligns with the lower edge of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget*>.
trans-unit.target: Se il bordo superiore dello schermo nasconde il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref>, il controllo viene riposizionato in modo che il bordo superiore viene allineato al bordo inferiore di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget*>

trans-unit.source: If the lower screen-edge obscures the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>, the lower edge of the control aligns with the lower screen-edge.
trans-unit.target: Se il bordo inferiore dello schermo nasconde il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref>, il bordo inferiore del controllo viene allineato al bordo inferiore dello schermo.

trans-unit.source: If the left or right screen-edge obscures the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref>, it then repositions itself to align with the obscuring screen.
trans-unit.target: Se il bordo sinistro o destro dello schermo nasconde il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref>, il controllo viene riposizionato per allinearlo allinearsi quindi.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.
